Whangaroa hapū celebrate end of plans to mine the area as mining giant pulls out https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/whangaroa-hapu-celebrate-end-of-plans-to-mine-the-area-as-mining-giant-pulls-out/HPYVA7LXUVFSDER2UHSKYMN4OY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/whangaroa-hapu-celebrate-end-of-plans-to-mine-the-area-as-mining-giant-pulls-out/HPYVA7LXUVFSDER2UHSKYMN4OY/ Mike DinsdaleParty time for Whangaroa hapū as mining plans shelved Wed, 05 Feb 2025 01:00:00 +0000 Whangaroa hapū and Forest & Bird members at Manginangina Scenic Reserve, in a kauri forest west of Kerikeri, protesting mineral prospecting permits on conservation land last year. Their opposition has seen an Australian company pull out of plans to mine the area.
